languages.text: "О, Фалько, сколь трогателен и приятен твой визит! Да будет очаг в твоем доме всегда ярок и горяч, как звезды системы Гремнор! Передай Пощаде, что драгоценное внимание, оказанное моей скромной персоне, заставила мои глаза увлажниться, а сердце — петь!"

"Oh, Falco, I am much obliged, and touched by your presence! May the fire in your hearth burn forever bright and hot like the stars of the Gremnor System! Tell Mercy that this show of his precious attention toward my humble self brought dew to my eyes and a song to my heart!"
languages.original_text: "О, Фалько, сколь трогателен и приятен твой визит! Да будет очаг в твоем доме всегда ярок и горяч, как звезды системы Гремнор! Передай Пощаде, что драгоценное внимание, оказанное моей скромной персоне, заставила мои глаза увлажниться, а сердце — петь!"

traits.locale_text: "Oh, Falco, I am much obliged, and touched by your presence! May the fire in your hearth burn forever bright and hot like the stars of the Gremnor System! Tell Mercy that this show of his precious attention toward my humble self brought dew to my eyes and a song to my heart!"

"Oh, Falco, I am much obliged, and touched by your presence! May the fire in your hearth burn forever bright and hot like the stars of the Gremnor System! Tell Mercy that this show of his precious attention toward my humble self brought dew to my eyes and a song to my heart!"

"Oh, Falco, I am much obliged, and touched by your presence! May the fire in your hearth burn forever bright and hot like the stars of the Gremnor System! Tell Mercy that this show of his precious attention toward my humble self brought dew to my eyes and a song to my heart!"

"Oh, Falco, I am much obliged, and touched by your presence! May the fire in your hearth burn forever bright and hot like the stars of the Gremnor System! Tell Mercy that this show of his precious attention toward my humble self brought dew to my eyes and a song to my heart!"

languages.text: “噢，法尔科，你的到来让我非常感动，也非常感激！愿你的炉火永远炽热明亮，就如同格雷姆诺星系的群星一样！请转告悯慈，他对我这么卑微的人的热切关注，让我不禁热泪盈眶，我的灵魂都仿佛在歌唱！”
languages.original_text: "Oh, Falco, I am much obliged, and touched by your presence! May the fire in your hearth burn forever bright and hot like the stars of the Gremnor System! Tell Mercy that this show of his precious attention toward my humble self brought dew to my eyes and a song to my heart!"

traits.locale_text: “噢，法尔科，你的到来让我非常感动，也非常感激！愿你的炉火永远炽热明亮，就如同格雷姆诺星系的群星一样！请转告悯慈，他对我这么卑微的人的热切关注，让我不禁热泪盈眶，我的灵魂都仿佛在歌唱！”

languages.text: 「ああ、ファルコ、アタシはアンタの存在に感謝し、感動しているよ！アンタの暖炉の火が、グレムノール星系の星々のように、いつまでも明るく熱く燃え続けますように！マーシーに伝えてよ、この謙虚なアタシに対する彼の貴重な配慮が、アタシの目に雫を、心に歌をもたらしたんだってね！」
languages.original_text: "Oh, Falco, I am much obliged, and touched by your presence! May the fire in your hearth burn forever bright and hot like the stars of the Gremnor System! Tell Mercy that this show of his precious attention toward my humble self brought dew to my eyes and a song to my heart!"

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、ファルコ、アタシはアンタの存在に感謝し、感動しているよ！アンタの暖炉の火が、グレムノール星系の星々のように、いつまでも明るく熱く燃え続けますように！マーシーに伝えてよ、この謙虚なアタシに対する彼の貴重な配慮が、アタシの目に雫を、心に歌をもたらしたんだってね！」

languages.text: «Ah, Falco, te estoy muy agradecida, ¡tu presencia me honra! ¡Que el fuego de tu hogar arda eternamente como las estrellas del sistema Gremnor! ¡Dile a Mercy que esta muestra de atención hacia mi humilde persona ha traído una lágrima a mis ojos y una canción a mi corazón!».
languages.original_text: "Oh, Falco, I am much obliged, and touched by your presence! May the fire in your hearth burn forever bright and hot like the stars of the Gremnor System! Tell Mercy that this show of his precious attention toward my humble self brought dew to my eyes and a song to my heart!"

traits.locale_text: «Ah, Falco, te estoy muy agradecida, ¡tu presencia me honra! ¡Que el fuego de tu hogar arda eternamente como las estrellas del sistema Gremnor! ¡Dile a Mercy que esta muestra de atención hacia mi humilde persona ha traído una lágrima a mis ojos y una canción a mi corazón!».

languages.text: « Oh, Falco, c'est bien aimable à vous, et votre présence me touche ! Puissent les flammes qui vous animent ne jamais s'éteindre, à l'instar des étoiles du système de Gremnor ! Dites à Mercy que sa charmante attention pour mon humble personne m'aura mis la larme à l'œil et la joie dans le cœur ! »
languages.original_text: "Oh, Falco, I am much obliged, and touched by your presence! May the fire in your hearth burn forever bright and hot like the stars of the Gremnor System! Tell Mercy that this show of his precious attention toward my humble self brought dew to my eyes and a song to my heart!"

traits.locale_text: « Oh, Falco, c'est bien aimable à vous, et votre présence me touche ! Puissent les flammes qui vous animent ne jamais s'éteindre, à l'instar des étoiles du système de Gremnor ! Dites à Mercy que sa charmante attention pour mon humble personne m'aura mis la larme à l'œil et la joie dans le cœur ! »

languages.text: "Oh, Falco, besten Dank, ich bin regelrecht gerührt von Eurer Anwesenheit! Möge das Feuer in Eurem Herd immer hell und heiß brennen, so wie die Sterne im Gremnor-System! Berichtet Mercy, dass dieser Beweis seiner kostbaren Aufmerksamkeit ein Tränchen bei mir ausgelöst hat. Mein Herz hat förmlich gesungen!"
languages.original_text: "Oh, Falco, I am much obliged, and touched by your presence! May the fire in your hearth burn forever bright and hot like the stars of the Gremnor System! Tell Mercy that this show of his precious attention toward my humble self brought dew to my eyes and a song to my heart!"

traits.locale_text: "Oh, Falco, besten Dank, ich bin regelrecht gerührt von Eurer Anwesenheit! Möge das Feuer in Eurem Herd immer hell und heiß brennen, so wie die Sterne im Gremnor-System! Berichtet Mercy, dass dieser Beweis seiner kostbaren Aufmerksamkeit ein Tränchen bei mir ausgelöst hat. Mein Herz hat förmlich gesungen!"

languages.text: "Ah Falco, çok teşekkür ederim, burada oluşun beni çok duygulandırdı! Kalbindeki ateş, Gremnor Sistemi'nin yıldızları gibi sonsuza kadar cayır cayır yansın! Merhamet'e, bu naçiz şahsıma gösterdiği değerli ilgiden dolayı gözlerimin dolduğunu ve yüreğimin pır pır ettiğini iletirsin!"
languages.original_text: "Oh, Falco, I am much obliged, and touched by your presence! May the fire in your hearth burn forever bright and hot like the stars of the Gremnor System! Tell Mercy that this show of his precious attention toward my humble self brought dew to my eyes and a song to my heart!"

traits.locale_text: "Ah Falco, çok teşekkür ederim, burada oluşun beni çok duygulandırdı! Kalbindeki ateş, Gremnor Sistemi'nin yıldızları gibi sonsuza kadar cayır cayır yansın! Merhamet'e, bu naçiz şahsıma gösterdiği değerli ilgiden dolayı gözlerimin dolduğunu ve yüreğimin pır pır ettiğini iletirsin!"
